title.rendered: College Fair News from the HS Counseling Department

content.rendered: The HS Counseling Department will be hosting a college fair at Saratoga Springs High School on Thursday, September 25 from 6:30-8:00 PM in the Blue gymnasium. This is a wonderful opportunity for high school students to explore a variety of college options. We hope you will take advantage of these opportunities to explore a few two-year and four-year schools.
